pkgmetadata.longdescription: Faster K-Medoids Clustering Algorithms: FastPAM, FastCLARA, FastCLARANS // R wrappers of C++ implementation of Faster K-Medoids clustering algorithms (FastPAM, FastCLARA and FastCLARANS) proposed in Erich Schubert, Peter J. Rousseeuw 2019 doi:10.1007/978-3-030-32047-8_16.
